resources.string: "Yuta Okkotsu is a high school student who's suffering from a serious problem his friend has turnes into curse"
"Ichigo Kurasaki has always able to see ghost found out he's actually a shinigami"
"Nakajima was kicked out from his orphanage and now he becomes special police because of his ability"
"The dark soldier who can't use magic while in the Demon Lord's army, does he manage to survive?"
"Shinichi Sagara, a black corporate warrior. Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations"
"Reincarnated as Denburg Blade, the son of a legendary battle race chief, caught demons and a dragon at 12 years old."
"The demon lord of tyranny, Anos destroyed humans, spirits, and even gods is reincarnating in this world!"
"A murderer who cannot stop the urge to kill people is now living in a forein world"
"Mahiru is a beautiful girl, her classmates call her 'angel', cause she also smart"
"I am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I get stressed. Deon Hart. In the demon realm, he became the commander of the 0th Corps, the most trusted by the demon king!"
"Kim Roksu wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the villains in 'Birth of Hero'. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life?"

"Kim Hajin finds himself in a familiar world but an unfamiliar body. He had become a filler character with no importance to the story. The only clue to escaping is to stay close to the main storyline."
"The notorious magic school 'Euroguard', self-sufficiency is default, monster appearance is an option, and professors are all the same! The salty school life that I have never seen before begins."
"The top five players in the world, including Specter Seo Jun-ho, finally defeated the Frost Queen, but they fell into a deep slumber. After 25 years passed specter awakes from his slumber."
